For our growing company we are looking for an IT consultant with fire under the butt. If you are as passionate about cloud infrastructure as we are and want to continuously develop yourself, then join our team.
uRemoTech is a 100% remote IT consulting company based near Kiel in Schleswig-Holstein. We are burning to help clients across Germany move forward in DevOps, Cloud and Software Development. In the past years we have worked with well-known companies like Bertelsmann, Daimler or Otto.
Starting immediately, we are looking for an experienced IT consultant with a focus on “Cloud Engineering” in full-time, for a remote position. As part of our team, you will help support our clients on a variety of cloud-related topics and improve the effectiveness and quality of their development and operations processes.
You have fun doing:
Dealing with the 3 major public clouds. Building and monitoring cloud landscapes. Monitoring existing infrastructure. You are no stranger to IaC (Infrastructure as Code). Planning and implementing cloud migrations. Dealing with Docker, Kubernetes and cloud. Collaborating with other consultants and developers to find the best solutions for our customers. Familiarizing yourself with new topics to constantly expand your knowledge. Ideally, you bring with you:
Several years of work experience as a Cloud Engineer or in a similar role. Good knowledge of cloud tools and practices such as Continuous Integration (CI), Continuous Delivery (CD), Infrastructure as Code, GitOps, Monitoring, etc. Experience with Docker, Kubernetes, and at least one of the 3 major cloud providers. Good communication skills and customer focus. Willingness to work in home office or At the location of your choice. Very good German and good English skills. What we offer you:
The opportunity to develop yourself and your skills and work on interesting projects. Continuing education in the form of training and conferences. A MacBook to work with, because we know how important a good work device is. The flexibility and independence of a remote position. An attractive salary. 30 days of vacation. Interested? Then book your online interview HERE now!

title: Mission & Vision

content:
I myself was employed as an IT consultant. I implemented projects for customers and advised them. I kept asking myself the question: Why do we always do it the same way? There’s a much more efficient way! I had a vision and a goal: my aim is to reinterpret the world of IT consulting in order to change the status quo.
I wanted to make processes more efficient, be freer in the execution of my work, give customers an even better experience and work with people who pursue the same goals as I do.
This is exactly why I founded uRemoTech. A place where customers not only receive the best advice, but also find individual, practical solutions for their specific challenges. At the same time, uRemoTech offers employees the opportunity to take on responsibility, to continuously develop themselves and to harmoniously combine their professional and private lives. No more hour-long commutes, instead efficient working from home - supported by the latest technologies.
Today, the name uRemoTech proudly stands for the 3 fundamental pillars of the company:
u (you) stands for you: You are the center of attention! As an employee or customer for our service-oriented approach.
Remo (Remote): Symbolizes our 100% remote approach that we not only live, but also promote. This approach enables our team members to realize a flexible combination of private life and work in today’s digital age and thus creates an innovative way of working together.
Tech (technology): Tech symbolizes innovation. It is progress not only for us, but for everything in life and we are a part of it. Our focus is on the adept use of state-of-the-art technology to achieve technological excellence. Always with the aim of taking our customers to the next evolutionary stage of digitalization.
With the founding of uRemoTech, the I became a we. I am proud of my growing team that shares these values! Today, we are joined by more and more like-minded people who believe in our vision, live it every day and drive it forward.
Lennart Röder, CEO
summary: I myself was employed as an IT consultant. I implemented projects for customers and advised them. I kept asking myself the question: Why do we always do it the same way?

content:
1. Passion Motivation gives us the impetus to take the first step. Consistency is the key to achieving our goals. We are dedicated and passionate about both our customers and our own team. We are prepared to go the extra mile to promote growth - not only for our customers, but also in our own company.
2. Achieving more together Strong individuals make up our team. We believe that the synergies created through teamwork allow us to not only hit the target, but to go far beyond it. At our company, we know that teamwork is crucial to our success. Each team member contributes unique talents and skills that strengthen our community.
3. Continuous growth For us, continuous personal and professional development is the lifeblood of the current and future success of the individual, the team and therefore the entire company. We promote the continuous and ongoing development of all our employees through tailored offers and individual career planning. We believe that the growth of uRemoTech is directly proportional to the growth of each of our employees.
4. Freedom and flexibility Combining work with friends and family is the most important aspect of a modern world. We work a lot, we like to work. But besides work, there are many other things that are important in life. That’s why we have created a 100% remote working approach and flexible working hours so that you can combine work and private life. This is exactly how we create a completely different way of working and have the best team, regardless of the location of the individual employee.
5. personal responsibility & cooperative leadership We want all our employees to actively participate in the development of the company by making their contribution conscientiously and responsibly. Our collaborative leadership style encourages individuals to make responsible strategic decisions for the benefit and progress of uRemoTech.
